title: Studio Apartment, 1 Bath
posting_body: This is a very spacious and well-placed studio apartment in Gold Coast Chicago.
Easy access to groceries, restaurants and clubs all around the apartment building and less than a half mile from the Chicago beach.
Laundry units are conveniently located in the basement and utilize a reloadable card system.
Studio features 2 large closets and full kitchenette.
The bathroom is modern with bathtub, shower and storage behind the mirror and beneath the sink.
One of the closets has a very large mirror mounted on two individually moving slide doors.
Two large windows offer a fantastic view of the Chicago skyline and plenty of fresh air.
Heavy police presence offers peace of mind when out on the town.
Generally speaking the vast majority of residents here are middle-aged.
